name: XWUI QR Code Component
description: QR code display component that generates and displays QR codes. Supports various error correction levels, custom colors, background colors, and optional center icon. Uses canvas for rendering.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

size.description: Size of the QR code in pixels

level.description: Error correction level (L=Low, M=Medium, Q=Quartile, H=High)

bgColor.description: Background color of the QR code

icon.description: Icon image URL or data URI to display in center of QR code

iconSize.description: Size of the center icon in pixels

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the QR code

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

value.description: Text or URL to encode in the QR code
